languages.text: {n}"Мой свет простирается повсюду. Жадный видит меня в золоте, ученый — в колыбели Человечества, но только праведник — в своей душе".{/n}
{n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Мой свет простирается повсюду. Жадный видит меня в золоте, ученый — в колыбели Человечества, но только праведник — в своей душе".{/n}

languages.text: {n}« Ma lumière illumine tout. Les cupides me croient d'or, les érudits me voient dans le berceau de l'humanité, mais seuls les vertueux me verront dans leur âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}« Ma lumière illumine tout. Les cupides me croient d'or, les érudits me voient dans le berceau de l'humanité, mais seuls les vertueux me verront dans leur âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}«Mi luz llega a todas partes. El codicioso me ve en el oro; el erudito, en la cuna de la Humanidad; pero solo los virtuosos me verán dentro de sus almas».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}«Mi luz llega a todas partes. El codicioso me ve en el oro; el erudito, en la cuna de la Humanidad; pero solo los virtuosos me verán dentro de sus almas».{/n}

languages.text: {n}“我的明光无处不在。贪婪的人会在黄金中看到我，博学之人会在人类的摇篮中看到我，但只有心怀正义之人，才能在他们的灵魂中看到我。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“我的明光无处不在。贪婪的人会在黄金中看到我，博学之人会在人类的摇篮中看到我，但只有心怀正义之人，才能在他们的灵魂中看到我。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}「私の光は何処へでも届く。貪欲な者たちは金の中に、学者たちは人類の揺りかごの中に私を見るだろう。しかし正しい者たちだけは、魂の中に私を見つけるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「私の光は何処へでも届く。貪欲な者たちは金の中に、学者たちは人類の揺りかごの中に私を見るだろう。しかし正しい者たちだけは、魂の中に私を見つけるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Mein Licht erstrahlt überall. Die Gierigen sehen mich im Gold. Die Gelehrten in der Wiege der Menschheit. Doch nur die Rechtschaffenen sehen mich in ihrer Seele."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Mein Licht erstrahlt überall. Die Gierigen sehen mich im Gold. Die Gelehrten in der Wiege der Menschheit. Doch nur die Rechtschaffenen sehen mich in ihrer Seele."{/n}
{n}"Mein Licht strahlt überall hin. Die Gierigen sehen mich im Gold. Die Gelehrten in der Wiege der Menschheit. Doch nur die Rechtschaffenen in ihrer eigenen Seele."{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Işığım her yere ulaşır. Açgözlüler beni altın içinde görür, âlimlerse İnsanlığın beşiğinde. Ancak beni yalnızca inananlar ruhlarının içinde görür."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"My light reaches everywhere. The greedy will see me in gold; the scholars, in Humanity's cradle; but only the righteous will see me within their souls."{/n}
